subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Food
Cooking and Cookbooks
Chefs
lead_paragraph: During the three-week, 2,150-mile Tour de France, riders consume up to 8,000 calories a day in snacks and meals prepared by team chefs.
snippet: During the three-week, 2,150-mile Tour de France, riders consume up to 8,000 calories a day in snacks and meals prepared by team chefs.
